name: Name
verification_page_message: To drive with us complete the verification process.
sd_guidlines_1: - Name, Date of Birth, Document Number should be clearly visible
sd_guidlines_2: - Complete address (including house number, street, building, name, locality etc) should be clearly visible
sd_guidlines_3: - Both FRONT and BACK of the document must be uploaded
sd_guidlines_4: - Blurry image of licence will not be accepted
sd_guidlines_5: - Document already registered with us will not be accepted
dl_guidlines_1: - Name, Date of Birth, Driver Licence Number, Expiry Date and Vehicle class should be clearly visible
dl_guidlines_2: - Both FRONT and BACK of the licence must be uploaded
dl_guidlines_3: - Colour photocopy, laminated version or blurry image of licence will not be accepted
dl_guidlines_4: - Licence alreay registered with us will not be accepted
dl_guidlines_5: - Any discrepancy in information will cause booking cancellation
lp_guidlines_1: - A live photo of your face needs to be taken
lp_guidlines_2: - Photo should be taken in full-face view directly facing the camera
lp_guidlines_3: - Keep a neutral facial expression and both eyes open
lp_guidlines_4: - Do not wear a hat, head covering, sunglasses, headphones, earphones or similar items
lp_guidlines_5: - Only YOUR face should be in the photo
no_vehicle_found:
No vehicles added yet
Tap "Add" button to add a vehicle
additional_info_message:
The more distance / duration you add, the more rides you will get.
By default 5 kms will be added.
drive_saved_message:
Thank you for driving with us.

You will be notified when someone request to ride with you.
